alert.note: Alert for Perry; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 10:24PM CDT until March 11 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Perry County in central Arkansas... East central Scott County in western Arkansas... Southwestern Yell County in central Arkansas... * Until 1015 PM CST. * At 924 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gravelly, or 17 miles east of Waldron, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Danville... Ola... Gravelly... Fourche Valley... Plainview in Yell County... Petit Jean River WMA... Muddy Creek WMA... Corinth... Wing... Olio... Kingston... Bluffton... Rover... Blue Ball... Sunlight Bay Park... Carter Cove Park... Union Hill... Chula... Macedonia in Yell County... Mt George... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
